name: mentor-mentee-backend
description: Backend API server for mentor-mentee matching application

scripts.start: npm run setup && nohup node server.js > server.log 2>&1 & echo $! > server.pid && echo '🔧 Backend started in background (PID: '$(cat server.pid)')' && echo '📄 Logs: tail -f server.log'
scripts.stop: [ -f server.pid ] && kill $(cat server.pid) && rm server.pid && echo '✅ Backend stopped' || echo 'ℹ️ Backend not running'
scripts.status: [ -f server.pid ] && echo '🔧 Backend PID:' $(cat server.pid) || echo '❌ Backend not running'

author: GitHub Copilot
